text.div:
update-care-teams

OPERATION: update-care-teams

The official URL for this operation definition is: 

http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/fhir/OperationDefinition/EpisodeOfCare-i-update-care-teams

Modify the care team assignment of the episode of care and all care plans that has the episode of care as context.

URL: [base]/EpisodeOfCare/[id]/$update-care-teams

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INaddCareteams0..*Reference
INremoveCareteams0..*Reference

name: update-care-teams
description: Modify the care team assignment of the episode of care and all care plans that has the episode of care as context.
